top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

Before you even mentioned the attachment for the slow close rails I was thinking "man, push-to-open drawers would be slick". 

That gets my vote.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I am confused.  Why do you say you welcome suggestions and then you go ahead and build and any suggestions are a waste of time for your audience. Enough said.
Put your pots and pans in drawers.  so easy topt away and store. keep the number of doors to a minimum.

I’m a little late but…
Don’t use Matt black fronts. It’s a nightmare to keep clean 🧼
